appinfo_list.name: Developer
appinfo_list.value: TV Master - Smart TV Remote Control

app_descript:
Universal Remote TV

Brief: No need to panic when your physical remote runs out of battery! Universal Remote TV is an innovative app designed to turn your Android phone with an infrared function into a universal control device for a multitude of TVs across various brands. With swift setup and user-friendly interface, this app serves as your electric ally that eases the inconvenience of handling multiple remotes for different devices.

Core Features:

  • Multi-Brand Compatibility: Supports over 20,000 TV models, providing flexibility and convenience for controlling different brands with a single app üì∫.
  • IR Blaster Requirement: Leverages the infrared function of your Android phone to control TVs, ensuring compatibility with IR-enabled devices üî¥.
  • Straightforward UI: Boasts an elegant and responsive user interface, making navigation and control simple and intuitive üé®.
  • No More Batteries: Say goodbye to purchasing batteries for your remotes. This app has got you covered for sustainable control üîã.
  • Custom Device Management: Offers the ability to save multiple custom devices for quick access and control üîß.

Pros:

  • üëç Cost-effective solution to replace physical remotes, avoiding additional expenses on batteries.
  • üëç Easy setup with a 3-step process: search your TV model, download the pack, and control your TV instantly.
  • üëç Intuitive design focused on enhancing user experience and interaction with the TV.
  • üëç Real-time remote action for increased responsiveness.

Cons:

  • üëé Relies on the presence of an IR blaster in your Android device, limiting usage for phones without this feature.
  • üëé Not an official remote control product of any TV brand, which may affect consumer trust.
  • üëé As it is a universal remote app, it might lack some specific functions dedicated to particular TV models.
  • üëé Requires initial download of source packs for the specific TV model which might not be as straightforward for non-tech-savvy users.

Price: The Universal Remote TV app is a free-to-download application. Any details about in-app purchases, if present, are unspecified üíµ.

Please note that this app is not affiliated with the TV brands listed and it requires your phone to support an infrared (IR) emitter to function properly.

Enjoy seamless control of your TVs, DVD players, VCRs, and set-top boxes with Universal Remote TV. Share the ease and functionality with friends and family, and enjoy the benefits of having an all-in-one remote on your Android device.
